name: Professional Go-Kart Simulator
overview: Get your Go-Kart and race against four other racers over three tracks to become champion. Professional Go-Kart Simulator is viewed from behind your Go-Kart with the track stretching out into the distance. As well as your normal speed you also have a turbo boost but be careful of the sides of the track as touching anything causes a crash. The game is played with either a joystick or the keyboard.
